titleStmt.title: A quip for an vpstart courtier: or, A quaint dispute betvveen veluet breeches and clothbreeches Wherein is plainely set downe the disorders in all estates and trades.
titleStmt.author: Greene, Robert, 1558?-1592.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Iohn Wolfe, and are to bee sold at his shop at Poules chayne,

notesStmt.note: Contains an attack on Gabriel Harvey and his brothers.
Based largely on: The debate betweene pride and lowlines.
The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Running title reads: A quippe for an vpstart courtier.
This edition collates A-H⁴; catchword, E3v, "turne".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
